Name: French Spring Punch
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and serve with straws.
Review: Not as popular as the Russian Spring Punch but still a modern day London classic.
History: Created by Dick Bradsell and Rodolphe Sorel at Match EC1, London, England, during the late 1990's.
Nutrition: One serving of French Spring Punch contains 149 calories
